Title.language: Doxology for St. Samuel the Confessor

language.div: Doksologi untuk St. Samuel Sang Pengaku Iman

comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Samuel the Confessor:
Untuk Peringatan St. Samuel Sang Pengaku Iman:

text.language: <ere peniwt abba Camou/l: pinis] qen nia~gioc: v/e~tafi~ri n~hannis] n~are~t/: qen p~twou n~te Sih/t.
Hail to Abba Samuel, the great among the saints, who has gained great virtues, in the mountain of Shiheet.

language.div: Salam bagi, Abba Samuel, agung di antara para kudus, yang peroleh banyak kebajikan, di gunung Shiheet.

text.language: السلام لأبينا أنبا صموئيل العظيم فى القديسين الذى صنع فضائل عظيمة فى جبل شيهات.
<ere peniwt abba Camou/l: v/e~tafvwq m~p~tomoc n~Lewn: ouoh aftajro n~nefc~n/ou: qen pinah] n~oryodoxoc.
Hail to our father Abba Samuel, who tore the Tome of Leo, he confirmed his brothers, in the Orthodox faith.

language.div: Salam bagi bapa kami Abba Samuel, yang robek Tome Leo, ia kuatkan saudara-saudaranya, dalam iman Ortodoks.

text.language: السلام لأبينا أنبا صموئيل الذى مزق طومس لاوون وثبت اخوته فى الايمان الأرثوذكسى.
Eybe vai af[oji n~cwf: n~je Makic Atria~noc pia~ceb/c: ouoh afi~ ha p~twou n~Kalamon: nem f~tou n~cwtp m~mona,oc.
Wherefore the impious one, Macius Atrianus sought him, he sent him to the mountain of Qualamon, with four chosen monks.

language.div: Maka si fasik Macius Atrianus, mencarinya dengan niat jahat, dan kirim dia ke gunung Qualamon, bersama empat biarawan pilihan.

text.language: لأجل هذا طارده ماكيس اتريانوس المنافق فأتى الى جبل القلمون مع أربعة رهبان مختارين.
Abba Camou/l pio~mologit/c: n~yof aferhupomonin: e~jen niqici n~te pidiwgmoc: nem ]e,malwcia~ n~te nibarbaroc.
Abba Samuel the confessor, was very patient, through the pains of the sufferings, and the captivity of Barbarians.

language.div: Abba Samuel sang pengaku iman, sangat sabar, tanggung derita dan sengsara, juga tawanan orang barbar.

text.language: أنبا صموئيل المعترف قد صبر على أتعاب الاضطهاد وسبى البربر.
<ere peniwt abba Camou/l: v/e~tafi~ri n~hanm/ini nem hans~v/ri: ouoh aftal[o n~n/etswni: qen pimonact/rion nem y~baki n~nibarbaroc.
Hail to our father Abba Samuel, who performed wonders and signs, he healed the sick, in the monastery and the city of the Barbarians.

language.div: Salam bagi Bapa kami Abba Samuel, yang lakukan mujizat dan tanda-tanda, sembuhkan orang sakit, di biara dan kota orang Barbar.

text.language: السلام لأبينا أنبا صموئيل الذى صنع آيات وعجائب وشفى المرضى فى الدير ومدينة البربر.
<ere peniwt abba Camou/l: V/e~tafswpi n~iwt n~na/t: nem ouref]c~bw n~a~gayoc: n~nefs/ri m~mona,oc.
Hail to our father Abba Samuel, who became a merciful father, and a good teacher, for his children the monks.

language.div: Salam bagi bapa kami Abba Samuel, yang jadi bapa penuh belas kasih, dan guru yang baik, bagi anak-anaknya para biarawan.

text.language: السلام لأبينا أنبا صموئيل الذى صار أبا رحوما ومعلما صالحا لأبنائه الرهبان.
<ere peniwt abba Camou/l: v/e~tafernis] e~masw: qen t~ve nem hijen pikahi: qaten V] nem nirwmi.
Hail to our father Abba Samuel, who became exceedingly great, in heaven and on earth, before God and men.

language.div: Salam bagi Bapa kami Abba Samuel, yang dimuliakan dengan sangat, di surga dan di bumi, di hadapan Allah dan manusia.

text.language: السلام لأبينا أنبا صموئيل الذى صار عظيما جدا فى السماء وعلى الأرض عند الله والناس.
